nodes.text: A battle chant was sometimes sung by Mandalorian warriors prior to engaging in battle. The chant was short, sung in the Mandalorian language of Mando'a, and was the nearest parallel to a prayer that could be found in contemporary Mandalorian culture.

Oya'cye
Kyr'am
Mare'cye
Darasuum
Oya! Oya!

Life
Death
Revelation
Eternity
Let's live! Let's hunt!

This unnamed Mandalorian chant was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the Star Wars Insider article, The Mandalorians: People and Culture. Written by author Karen Traviss, the article was published in February of 2006, as part of the Insider magazine's eighty-sixth issue.
